Region and District Summary

Region and District Summary for July 2015


Meeting and email time with customer

 

41% met of sales reps met the benchmark of 10.5 hours.

Reps averaged 8.8 hours with customers.

Meeting and email contact with customer

 

12% met of sales reps met the benchmark of 8.5 hours.

Reps averaged 6.8 hours with customers.

Customer network size

 

32% met of sales reps met the benchmark of 40 customers in their network.

Reps averaged 40 customers in their network.

Customer network size

 

36% met of sales reps met the benchmark of 18 customers in their network.

Reps averaged 16.8 hours.
